metadata.title: CVE-2024-28832 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Stored XSS in the Crash Report page in Checkmk before versions 2.3.0p7,2.2.0p28, 2.1.0p45, and 2.0.0 (EOL) allows users with permission to changeGlobal Settings to execute arbitrary scripts by injecting HTML elementsinto the Crash Report URL in the Global Settings.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
